document.full_text: allowing u.s. authorities to keep passenger records for 15 years is "totally disproportionate and unjustifiable," a german member of the european parliament said.
document.title: u.s.-e.u. anti-terrorism air travel data deal is faulted
lines_and_colors: allowing u.s. authorities to keep passenger records for 15 years is "totally disproportionate and unjustifiable," a german member of the european parliament said.
